components.label: Minimising the impact of cyber security incidents
Content
components.content: Please use this area to input any type of offering you believe cannot be captured in the above list. Please associate your offering type using the most relevant NIS Objective where possible: e.g. A2: Risk Management - <my product type>. This box is to be used to capture a type of offering, so please keep the description of a similarly high level to ‘consultancy’, ‘tool’, ‘training’, ‘research’ or ‘facilities’.

values.label: I have read the CNI Marketplace Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) and agree with these T&Cs.
I confirm the information I have provided within this form is accurate and a true representation of my company.
